law.catch_line: State contingency funding code for six (6) year road plan.
law.text: The Transportation Cabinet shall create a new funding code to be used in the six (6) year road plan to be known as state contingency funds and the abbreviation the cabinet shall use for this funding code shall be SC. The state contingency funding code shall be in addition to all other funding codes used by the cabinet in the six (6) year road plan and shall be used to identify all projects funded with state contingency account moneys.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 532, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1998.
